item.title: About me
item.description: I am a Ph.D. candidate in Economics at FGV/EPGE Brazilian School of Economics and Finance. My research interests include urban and development economics, transportation economics, environmental economics, and climate change adaptation. In my free time, I enjoy tabletop gaming, rock climbing, and reading comics. You can reach me at: maia.pedro@fgv.edu.br
